title: GCM - One registration id receiving duplicate notifications
body:
When I send a message to a certain registration id, the device always receives two notifications (which are exactly the same).

This is a one-to-one operation - One notification to one registration id.

I've done the test through an FCM message test service (such as http://pushtry.com/). One message triggers two notifications.

Any ideas on how that can be possible?
